reviews.review:
Ce jeu est une véritable claque scénaristique !!! celui qui cherche un jeu avec une histoire qui dépote est une fin de VERITABLE MALADE il faut pas qu'il cherche plus loin, ce jeu est pour lui! 
... nan mais sérieux, une fin de TARE!!! ... c'était GENIAL !!!
C'ETAIT DE LA BOMBE !!!
on peu dire que ça m'a fait un shock ...

This was the first game I played on my new i7 4770 rig, hooked up to a Sapphire r9 290. Sadly, the card died (BSOD), but whilst It lasted I managed to play 4 beautiful hours. Fantastic game. Getting an EVGA GTX 780 to play the rest.

Este jogo é simplesmente excepcional. A história dele é totalmente original, e cada minuto de jogatina é uma nova surpresa.
Enquanto você avança na história, simplesmente fica sedento e na expectativa de saber o que ocorrera a seguir.
Com certeza um dos melhores jogos que já tive o prazer de jogar.
A recomendação é definitiva. COmprar as DLC's vale a pena também.
A possibilidade de jogar com a Elisabeth deixa tudo mais interessante.

Ainda está na dúvida se compra ou não? Pode ir, não vai se arrepender!
zbs game
This game is amazing from the gameplay mechanics, the storyline, everything about this game, i love the bioshock series series!
A-MAZING
This game... it was dope.
This game is too good.

Ein unfassbar schönes Spiel! 
Fangen wir mal mit der Grafik an: Die Grafik ist wirklich der Hammer! Wenn man den Anfang auf der höchsten Grafikeinstellung spielt fühlt man sich so als wäre es die Offenbahrung. Die Grafik wurde mit sehr schönen Schattendetails. sowie generellen Details zsb. Wasserperlen auf der Kamera, wunderbare Lichtstrahlen usw. ausgeschmückt! Was mir besonders gut gefallen hat war wirklich die Grafik und diese Ideen mit der "Kräftekombi".

Jetzt leider (für mich) etwas sehr negatives.
Das Spiel basiert irgendwie leicht auf einem Arenaprinzip, du kämpfst dich von Stage zu Stage und musst überleben. Wäre diese Story nicht so unglaublich schön, und die Grafik nicht so genial hätte es nicht soviele Chancen. Also alleine wegen dieser tollen Story... Klare Kaufempfehlung! :)

This game is great, I loved it the graphics, the story, the controlls  everything was great. i would say that you would need to play the first and second bioshock before you play this one but it honestly isnt that big of a deal if you really just want to play this one since the othere ones are a little dated but overall great game highly recommend it.
It's Ok

One of the BEST Story Lines ! and for those who look for a Challenge to collect all the Achievements they certainly will be looking for a tough challenge.

Highly Recommend !
After sorting out preformnce issues, i have to say the visuals are absouloutly stuning. The games story and ending may seem confusing but once I figured it out, my mind was blown. 10/10
Great game, one of the best ive played. Defo a must buy for any keen gamer. 10/10

[b]Bioshock Infinite: 8/10[/b]

So yeah, let's start doing game reviews. On Steam. Which nobody will read. Fun!

I've played the first few hours of the original Bioshock, and none of the second, so I'm no exactly a Bioshock buff (if I was, I would probably have bought the game an year ago). The original Bioshock is praised for being highly atmospheric, for having an awesome story and setting. The same applies to Bioshock: Infinite. Great and interesting setting, great and interesting story, and Elizabeth (your AI companion for the majority of the game) is incredible. Awesome character and companion, and the scripted banter between her and your character, Booker, is amazing. For this alone the game is worth buying.

Bioshock Infinite have two major flaws however.

[b]1) Gunplay:[/b] This was the main issue in the original Bioshock for me, and it's the main issue in Bioshock: Infinite. It's not as bad as in Bioshock, but in an otherwise amazing game with a masterpiece world, the combat is JUST acceptable. Serviceable, is a good word for it. It only JUST does its job, and nothing more. That's an issue when that's what you're going to actually DO for 50% of the game, and the other half is spend exploring, looking for stuff (and lore) to help you when you go shooty shooty bang bang. Besides being generally clunky and very chaotic in a bad way, the combat has several small issues in it, but I won't go too much into detail about that here.

[b]2)The Narrative vs the Gameplay:[/b] To say it bluntly, Bioshock: Infinite's gameplay doesn't make a lot of sense when you think about the narrative it's telling you. What you're told and what you do simply doesn't click together. This is because they've put the same gameplay from Rapture into Columbia. Rapture is a city in ruins, where killing and scavenging makes perfect sense, and the plasmids are a part of the narrative and world.

In Columbia however, this is not the case. This is a fully functioning city, where you going on a rampage through the city and scavenging in people's homes and digging hotdogs up from the trash to eat for minimal health gain makes little sense. Rapture was in a Civil War, while Columbia seems to have ammo-automats everywhere in the city for little reason. Vigors (Infinite's plasmids) also makes no sense in Columbia. You're given your first vigor at a market for free, and find them all around the city, yet besides for one boss and two types of enemies, vigors are not used at all by the citizens of Columbia. Why wouldn't the police have the same vigors as you? Why does nobody make YOU levitate? In fact, a lot of people even question if Bioshock: Infinite really needed to be a shooter at all. 

With all that said though: while Bioshock: Infinite is let down by its gunplay and gameplay that have no business being in Columbia, Columbia is a fantastic place, and the story really is something special. An amazing experience, which makes this a great game.

Gud story
Gud gameplay
Gud characters

Gud
ate rotten popcorn out of a trashcan. 10/10

There are actually no words to describe how incredible this game is. The graphics, the storytelling, the characters, they are all so incredibly well. The relationships between characters are very well shown and the voice acting is amazing. The story is one of the greatest I have ever played, it was just blowing my mind.
Skvělá hra, která mě dostala svým příběhem :) Doporučuji!!!!
Great game! loved the story and the twists and turns. definatly worth the buy!

Am Anfang ist es ziemlich undurchsichtig bzw. man hat einfach kaum ne Ahnung warum man macht, was man macht. Es werden immer nur kurze "etappenziele" gesetzt und erst am Ende macht alles überhaupt keinen Sinn mehr. Das heißt einiges schon aber es kommen einfach viele viiieeele Fragen auf die vorher gar nicht im Raum standen. Daher eine sehr, wirklich sehr gelungene Story, an der maximal an ein zwei Stellen über unstimmigkeiten gemeckert werden könnte. 

Das Gameplay weißt größere Unterschiede zum Vorgänger auf als gedacht. Plasmide wurden durch allerhand neue "Kräfte" ersetzt die teils ziemlich cool, lustig oder auch einfach verdammt sadistisch sind.
Das Kampfsystem mit Waffen hat sich meiner Meinung nach sehr zum guten verbessert. Schrotflinten machen endlich ordentlich Schaden, anvisieren ist mit jeder Waffe möglich, allerdings kann die Waffe während eines skyline-trips geladen werden ... dritter Arm ?! ^^. 
Es gibt eine große Bandbreite an Waffen leider können neben dem Skyhook immer nur zwei Waffen geführt werden.
Auch hat sich vieles im Bereich Versorgung geändert. Man bekommt zwar einen Schild dazu, allerdings kann man keinen Vorrat mehr führen. so muss man in fights immer nach medipacks oder "salzen" ausschau halten. Elisabeth hilft an dieser stelle und auch beim Munition sammeln zum glück immer fleißig mit.

Zum sonstigen Gameplay:
ich vermisse die möglichkeit selber zu hacken oder schlösser zu knacken ein Bisschen. Auch das man Waffen- und Kraftupdates aus einem Topf zahlen muss hat mich persönlich ein Bisschen gestört, weil es ja nicht open World ist und man nur eine Bestimmte Menge Geld finden kann. Somit hat bei mir immer etwas Armut geherrscht wenn es um Upgrades ging.
Allerdings holt die Atmosphere und eigentlich das Gesamtpaket, Grafik, Animationen, Sound und Effekte eine ganze Menge heraus. Es hat mir wirklich eine Menge Spaß gemacht, durch die Gegend zu hopsen und zu linen, die Aussicht zu genießen und gegnern grobmotorisch den Kopf vom Rumpf zu trennen :D
Alles in allem eine definitive Kaufempfehlung und wenn man schräge Endings mag ists definitiv ein muss. Überhaupt für alle fans der Reihe.
Awesome

Loved Bioshock? This is even better.

It's gorgeous and the plot and characters are great!
Лучшая игра, которую я проходил!

Immersive environments, great combat, and I just love the vigors. The writing and character development is fantastic, and it's nice to have a protagonist that talks. I also like how they eliminated the moral choice system from the first Bioshock, which was kind of annoying, but it's a bittersweet loss; for a game whose plot is built on the idea that the smallest choices impact the future of reality, the flip choices you do make don't actually do a lot. Still a great game.
EPIC!!!!!

Played all the bioshock games, the first one was a masterpiece and 3rd installment will not fail any videogame lover out there. 

It improves in every aspect that we could imagine of the previous games, the story will keep you hanged into the game and you will be thirsty for more, it will really blow your mind.

In addition, the season pass is a must have, it wraps up with the events on the first bioshock and offers a great finale for the trilogy.
Exellent jeu, beau et très immersif

Игра просто азмечательная. В ней есть и отличный, захватывающий и драматичный сюжет. Советую для полного его понимая пройти всю линейку этой чудесной игры. Графика в этой игре уникальна, что можно сказать и о городах Колумбия и Восторг. Можно сказать, как и в хорощей книге, присутствует элементы противопоставленией, кульминаций и неожиданных развязок. Думаю, вам понравиться прохождение игры, ведь для этого есть все условия. Удачного прохождения, кто не успел пройти этот шедевр!
Its a brilliant game with a very intresting story line.  Highly recommended but sadly its not multyplayer

Сюжет игры довольно неординарный и очень интересный. Игра наполнена непередаваемой атмосферой - ландшафты, звуковое сопровождение, главные и второстепенные герои - всё в ней кажется органичным и увлекательным. Вокруг множество красок, экспрессии и неожиданных поворотов, а герои, словно живые люди, с эмоциями и настроениями. Советую её =))
바이오쇼크 시리즈들 중 가장 선형적이다. 활력 업그레이드는 할 가치가 있으나 무기업그레이드는 별 실감이 나지 않는다. 그래도 스토리와 케릭터성이  모든 단점들을 보완하고도 남는다.개인적으로는 E3에서 공개되었을 당시의 호평받았던 특징들이 대부분 사라져서 아쉽기도 하다.

初めてバイオショックシリーズをこのゲームでプレイしました。なんといってもNPCの使い方が素晴らしいと思いまする。それぞれに違った生活感があったり、一緒に行動するエリザベスも補助的に戦闘に参加してくれることで共闘している気持ちにさせてくれ戦闘シーンもとても楽しめました。ストーリーも考えさせられる場面が多く個人的にはとても楽しめるストーリーでした。ただマップがないためどこからきたのか迷うことがあり、そこは改善してほしいと思います。しかし、それを気にせず楽しめるゲームですのでお金に余裕のある方は購入を検討してみてはいかが？

Fast paced action, interesting story, decent visuals.

9/10

ストーリーとしては少々釈然としないものの、中盤に登場する暗黒資本家ジェレミア・フィンクの館内啓発放送が素敵すぎてどうでもよくなってしまう。日本語吹き替えを担当するのはなんと速水奨。ほかにいくらでも適役がいるような気がするけど、いー声で演じてくだすってる。

everything my heart desired

The right Approach to playing the Bioshock Infinite Series:

Step 1: Play the main game (Hard mode recommended)
Step 2: Play Clash in the Clouds, just to try it out
Step 3: Play the main game again to understand the ending 
(or some more just to do some crazy stuff- you'd know what i mean )
Step 4: Play Burial at Sea Episode 1
Step 5: Play Burial at Sea Episode 2
Step 6: Say what the heck and play Burial at Sea Episode 2 1999 Mode
Step 7: Play Biohock, just to see if you can spot that special someone and freshen them good memories of Rapture
Step 8: Play Bioshock 2 so that you can be a Big Daddy!

[b]Gladius Dei or "same, same but different!"[/b]

Bioshock Infinite is basically a revamped version of BS2 in a new environment. The gameplay is superior over the other episodes and much better balanced. The story is nearly as good as the first one. It cares for the female player, got lotsa eye-candy and has the highest grade of replayability compared to the other parts. In my opinion, balancing story and gameplay, the best of all 3 [i]Bioshock[/i] games. If you liked the others, you will also like this one. At best, you played just BS1 and not the 2nd part beforehand (unless you wanna play all 3).

[b]story[/b]
Though BS2 had not a bad story, the [i]Would you kindly?[/i] moment was missing. Now, you got a repackaged BS2 story which takes care of that. It is somewhat unrelated to the other episodes and you could use it as a starter to the [i]Bioshock[/i] world, though due to graphics and gameplay, I advise against it.
It definitely tries to get the girls to the consoles as in a slightly female colour scheme, a female hero w/o mega t[noparse]it[/noparse]s nor skin tight leather... and to top that up, even a change of hair dressing is included! ;P 
That said, there is enough blood, dirt and gore and [i]Bioshock[/i] manages once more to combine high morals with bloodiest violence and beautiful sceneries.
A lot has been recycled from BS2, though: It feels a bit like the [i]Syren Alley[/i] level and its objective being a whole game combined with the [i]Eleanor[/i] meta story. In [i]Ryan's Amusements[/i] you had to get a Plasmid inside a propaganda amusement park for kids in order to continue a journey on a train. In [i]Soldier's Field[/i] the difference is only that Plasmids are called [i]Vigors[/i] and that you continue your journey in a Gondola. Besides an obstacle blocks your carriage and you have to get the Plasmid/Vigor inside a children's propaganda theme park. [i]Fink[/i] and his stage reminded me a bit of [i]The Great Alexander[/i] - There are many moments which feel like BS2.

[b]gameplay[/b]
Used to be the biggest pain in the a[noparse]rs[/noparse]e on its predecessors, but the [i]Bioshock[/i] team seems to learn by trial and error. Each part gets better gameplay-wise and now, the mindless spawning and many shortcomings of BS1 and BS2 are gone.
The gameplay is much better balanced due to:

* "Killer"-Plasmids are mostly gone in the main game (like [i]Winter Blast[/i] for example).
* Plasmids are generally better balanced and thus less powerful than before.
* [i]Adam[/i] is gone as character building source it is now "all about money". Since corpses contain money, the infinite spawning of enemies is gone in BS Infinite.
* the marvellous [i]Green Arrow[/i] which gives you directions on demand!  No more "Should I turn the quest arrow on or off?" A+++
* The research system is gone and nobody will miss it!
* Sadly, the mini-games are gone, too. Elizabeth lockpicks the doors, safes and chests for you now.
* Enemies and gear are revamped but the same: [i]Houdinis[/i], now called [i]Zealots[/i], are fewer but tougher. [i]Handymen[/i] are basically extra fiery [i]Brute Splicers[/i] and the [i]Rumbler[/i] returns in a downgraded version as [i]Beasts[/i]; there is even a [i] Mark Meltzer[/i] moment. [i]Insect Swarm[/i] is also far less powerful now and replaced by [i]Murder of Crows[/i] - which is a good thing, since [i]Insect Swarm[/i] and [i]Winter Blast[/i] was all you needed, even on the most difficult settings.
* generally, the gameplay is more stream-lined, though there are more collectibles.
* Negative: More [i]CoD[/i]-like in the sense of a less tactical approach and the shortage of resources.
* Many tutorial elements in the game are too short or simply missing. [i]Vigor Combos[/i] for example, though there would have been enough chance for it on some fair stand. 
* The skyline could be better integrated into the gameplay, but as mentioned below, it seems to be technically the most critical part.

[b]graphics, bugs & Co[/b]
Ran it on Win7 64bit with a Geforce GTX760 on highest settings w/o problems. Only major bugs I encountered was on the skyline, there I got stuck under certain circumstances. Also, the only minor bug I am aware of is as well connected to the skyline. It let's [i]Liz[/i] circle the skyline for hours, once I am already off - but it doesn't hinder progress and at some stage she is back.
Unfair to compare graphics, since I played both old parts on XP, but lotsa eye-candy indeed. And as I found just far more "picturesque". 

[b]Burial at Sea[/b]
Haven't played it as of yet....

[b]Btw: Si tacuisses... ![/b]
Hm, a game that costs soo much money to produce and is so in love with detail, ridicules itself by misuse of professionell knowledge?
The first steps into [i]Columbia[/i] makes you believe you entered an alternate world of idiots: 
* [i]Gladium[/i] is like [i]clavem[/i] an [i]Accusative[/i] version of the words [i][b]gladius[/b],-i[/i] and [i][b]clavis[/b],-e[/i].
* 2 [i]Lockpicks[/i] will never open a lock, but inserting a [i][b]tension wrench[/i] and a [i]lockpick[/i][/b] will. Besides but important: [b]Locks don't get damaged[/b] by picking (but picking can be detected forensicly).
I felt like I was watching a movie as much as I was playing a video game.
故事內容敘述得很有趣，又有繁體中文，推薦
Great game, good gunplay, excellent graphics, intriguing story although not convinced about the ending.
Macht Spass
Замечательная игра! Очень понравилась, особенно концовка

Capolavoro assoluto! Se avete giocato i primi due bioshock e come me avete trovato eccessivamente claustrofobica e ripetitiva l'ambientazione questo Infinite cambierà tutto! Ambienti ampi e illuminati amalgamati come sempre ad una serie di nemici increbili e variegati! La grafica è qualcosa di incredibile veramente,  ma ciò che vi lascerà più d'ogni altra cosa con la bocca aperta è la coo-protagonista della vostra avventura, la dolcissima Elizabeth! Credo d'avero giocato a centinaia di giochi finora, ma pochissimi avevano dei personaggi realizzati alla perfezione come questo, ogni espressione della ragazza sembra così vera e viva che non potra che immergervi nella trama ancora di più, il movimento dei suoi occhi e dei sopraccigli, il suo sorriso, insomma quando giocherete vi sentirete così coinvolti dalla sua personalità da ritrovarvi a sorridere senza rendervene conto, veramente è qualcosa d'incredibile. La trama poi è qualcosa di unico!!! Non posso aggiungere di più perchè cadrei inevitabilmente in qualche spoiler ma veramente provatelo perchè questo sarà sicuramente il miglior gioco che avrete giocato finora!

I pro:
Grafica incredibile
Trama mozzafiato
Ambientazioni varie e fantastiche
Armi e poteri a volontà
Nemici variegati e boss assurdi
Coo-protagonista unica! Assolutamente da vedere!

Contro:
Sinceramente non saprei trovare qualcosa di negativo in questo gioco, è uno di quei pochissimi titoli che ti lasciano solo cose belle una volta terminato, forse avrei voluto un finale alternativo, ma non voglio spooilerare quindi vi invito soltanto a giocarlo!

Wunderschöne Grafiken, exzellentes Gameplay und eine unglaublich tolle Geschichte.
Ein Highlight ist sowieso Elizabeth, die einem in Nu ans Herz wächst.
Definitiv lohnenswert, BioShock Infinite zu kaufen!

A dir poco spettacolare. Se siete amanti dello steampunk questo gioco DEVE far parte della vostra libreria.
In ogni caso la giocabilità è ottima, non è particolarmente complicato. È uno dei pochi giochi che fonde lo sparatutto con le tipiche capacità magiche di un fantasy, il che rende ulteriormente presente l'atmosfera steampunk. A completare il quadro già positivo c'è una trama che ancora una volta dimostra di essere una delle colonne portanti per Valve. 

Forse l'unico difetto è che alla fine vorresti ce ne fosse ancora. Probabilmente il finale sarebbe stato ancora più ghiotto se ci fossero state anche solo altre 5 o 6 ore di gioco (il che mi porta a consigliare di acquistare dei DLC che vi permettano di fare qualche altra missione, prima di concludere il titolo).

Assolutamente consigliato agli appassionati, ma credo che questo gioco sia un must anche per chi non ama particolarmente il genere.

Il mio voto personale è di 8.5/10

Я переиграл во множество игр. И могу сказать одно, что эта игра стала моим фаворитом во всем, в геймплее, в сюжете, в красоте и, конечно, в персонажах. 
Сначала я прошел эту игру на xbox, позж я купил ее со всеми ее дополнениями и прошел еше раз. 
Вот сначала поялвяется Элизабет, прекрасная, очаровательная помощница. Как тут не влюбиться? Но, когда ты начинает проходить Burial at sea, ты окончательно понимаешь, что Элизабет главные герой, а не Букер. 
Я считаю, что концовка в Burial at sea лучше всего заканчивает игру. 
Как у меня появится большой телек, пройду этот шедевр еще раз
10/10
Прекраснейшая игра с прекраснейшим сюжетом с прекраснейшей Элизабет
Mindgames <3
This incredible story and even better looking!

What to say about Bioshck Infinte? Okay, well the first thing we see is an abandonded lighthouse and a kinda ominous and obviously shady deal. If this doesn't make it already stand out then i don't know what does. I went into this game thinking "Oh great another boring shooter with no story" but oh dear god I was wrong. You play through the game and soon start to reakise that something in Collumbia isn't quite right especially when it comes to the girl you've rescued- Elizabeth. An intense and twisted story that still has me blown away and each time I replay it I see more and more of the dots connect. The Protagonist (you) isn't a completly generic pile of code and actually has an interesting story that starts to take a turn for the worst. The vigors and great vareity of weapons keep the gameplay interesting, not to mention the different enimies that are thrown at you and seem to both challenge you and also set the tone of the city for you. A very dislikable antagonist with one hell of a backstory. The game is beautiful and with it set in 1912 and all it makes it seem like the stunning floating city of Columbia is un-phased by your intense havoc with bright colours that make the game seem comical in a strange way. The colour pallets can change within seconds from browns and golds to blacks and greys all of which perfectly complement the mood. Oh yeah and Elizabeth isn't completley uselss as she scavenges salts, coins and ammo to aid your in your battles or she can just you know tear a whole through space and time to just give you what you need (yep). So incase ypu couldn't tell by this HIGHLY positive review, I fiercly recommend this game; it was my game of the year last year and is perhaps my favourite game of all time-

10/10

Predom sa ospravedlňujem nie som žiaden spisovateľ ani moja slovenčina nie je úžasná ale táto hra je natoľko úžasná že som sa rozhodol napísať recenziu. Tákže Bioshock Infinite o tejto hre sa toho dá napísať strašne veľa ale chcem to spraviť strunče takže napíšem iba + a - hry.

+Grafika
+Hrateľnosť 
+Príbeh (až na koniec ktorý je trocha metúci)
+Atmosféra
+Elizabeth
A teraz -
-Strašne ale strašne smutný koniec

Záver a hodnotenie: 10/10 hral som hry ako GTA V, Witcher 2 a Diablo 3 ale táto hra je jediná ktorá ma takmer dohnala k plaču. Najlepšia hra ktorú som hral, ani nie hrateľnosťou alebo grafikou na tejto hre je skrátka niečo čo sa neda slovami opísať.

best story evar, same goes with earlier bioshocks <33

Потрясающий мир в стиле стимпанк, Отличная озвучка, не убитая локализацией. Звуки, картинка, экшн, крутые пушки, затяжные прыжки, красавица Элизабет - все это приправлено шикарной атмосферой и потрясающим сюжетом. Тег "Шедевр" заслужен абсолютно.
Game is not as good as the reviews will tell you.

대체 무엇을 망설이는가?

일단 인피니트는 82시간 정도를 플레이했고 80개의 업적을 모두 따면서 내가 느낀 이 게임에 대한 소감을 작성해본다.

미려한 그래픽은 일단 기본. 컬럼비아에 들어간 순간 당신은 이 게임이 바다 속에서 렌치질 하던 그 바이오쇼크가 맞는지 의심을 할 것이다.

스토리 전개는 너무 복잡하고 호불호가 갈리겠지만 음성파일을 하나하나 찾아가며 엔딩을 보는 순간 큰 충격을 받게 될 것이고 2회차를 진행한다면 그 동안 무심코 지나친 모든것들이 사실은 거대한 이야기를 위한 복선임을 깨닫게 될 것이다.

무기가 다양하지 못 한 것은 전작들에 비해 뒤쳐지는 아쉬운 부분. 근접무기와 2개의 사격 무장이라는 빈곤함을 다양한 활력과 활력 콤보를 통해 메꾸어야 한다. 하지만 전작들보다.. 특히 바이오쇼크2보다 전투 면에서 지루한 것은 어쩔 수 없다.

하지만 이 단점이 있음에도 인피니트를 평작이 아닌 수작으로 만드는 것은 거대한 스토리와 그 스토리를 풀어나가는 뛰어난 연출, 그리고 NPC임에도 마치 살아있는 사람마냥 반응을 보이는 조력자 엘리자베스 때문일 것이다. 특히 히로인인 엘리자베스는 타작품에 으레 등장하는 보호만 받는 히로인을 거부한다는데서 꽤나 신선함을 느꼈다. 그녀는 바하4의 짐순이마냥 전투때 죽지도 않으며 전투시에 체력키트나 탄약을 던져주고 빚쟁이인 부커를 위해 동전도 적선한다. 인피니트가 싱글 게임임에도 엘리자베스 덕분에 유저는 결코 혼자서 플레이한다는 느낌이 들지 않을 것이다.

본편 엔딩 크레딧을 감상하면 성우들이 노래를 부르는 영상도 포함되어 있으니 스킵하지 말고 봐주길 바란다.


DLC인 구름 위의 사투는 그냥 업적 노가다용 미니 게임이다. 업적에 크게 신경을 쓰지 않는 유저라면 패스해도 무방한 그런 모드이다. 다만 구름위의 사투를 플레이하면서 모은 돈으로 인피니트의 설정 일러스트나 제작과정을 담은 영상을 볼 수 있다는 것만 말하고 싶다.

바다의 무덤 1, 2부. 지금까지 DLC를 사면서 정말 내가 돈 주고 이딴 DLC를 사야 하나.. 굉장히 망설인 적이 한두번이 아니다. 실제로 거의 대부분의 DLC들이 원래 게임에 넣어야 할 것 같은 스토리를 절묘하게 잘라내서 따로 파는 느낌이었으니까..  하지만 바다의 무덤을 플레이하면서는 한 번도 그런 느낌을 가진 적이 없다. 공중 도시 컬럼비아에서 본편 엔딩을 본 플레이어는 DLC로 진입하자마자 새로운 그래픽으로 재탄생한 랩처에서 이 곳이 과연 우리가 렌치를 들고 스플라이서 머리를 부수고 다니던 그 랩처가 맞는지 의심하며 두리번거리게 될 것이다.

그리고 본편과는 또다른 모습의.. 반전이 있는 1부, 그리고 진정한 의미의 시리즈 완결을 보여준 2부를 플레이하고나면 왠지 바이오쇼크1을 다시 해보고 싶은 마음이 조금 생겨날 것이다.

Extremely sexy graphics, mediocre story, fun gameplay. Although I think the use of vigors made the player too overpowered, it was a fun experience getting through the game.
Get it on sale, 8/10
La historia es brutal. Vale MUCHO la pena comprarlo

This game is easily one of my favourites for single player campaign. The story is so damn good, atmosphere is so good, graphics are insanely good and run at high FPS's atleast on my machine. The area you've been in Rapture was the last location in last two titles. But now you're in a place called Columbia is I recall correctly (haven't played it in a while) is the polar oppisite to the last two titles, instead of deep sea diving, you're sky diving (sort of). The way you get around this flying metropolis is by zip-lining in a way you have a hook meele weapon which can be used to slice and dice people faces of their faces, but it's also used to crappling onto rails in the air which you can drop from of and land of people removing their faces from their once was face. The abilities are really cool and innovative, my favourite is this octopus one which gives you a reef with clams and such on your hand. Overall this game is a must buy for any single player experience it's on sale now and it gave me a solid 10 hours of fun, exciting and original gameplay. Buy it now.

While the gameplay isn't that difficult to handle, there are a lot of keys and functions to keep track of and the story is amazingly completely and well done.  I find myself more interested in the story than the actual game.

Quite possibly one the best games of all time. The graphics really help the game along, but I found myself more captivated by the storyline. Although the game is linear, the atmosphere created by having a city in the clouds makes the game feel open world. Balanced weapons and good AI bring it home in a big way. Pick this up; you won't be sorry.

Having never played any Bioshock before, I went in a little nervous, but this game just blew me away. No other story or game for that matter has made me sit back in my chair and left me speechless when I finished it. This is definately a must buy game!

Tolle engine, cool charaktere und eine story die noch tage nach dem beenden des spiels fesselt und zu nachdenken anregt.
Die mischung aus magie und shooter ist toll gelungen und das spiel macht von spielspass sehr viel her.
Auch wenn es abundzu unschöne texturen giebt und die immergleichen gesichter bei den "statisten" auf dauer stören, ist es seinen preis auf jedenfal wert und nur weiterzuempfehlen!
This game made me cry. I'm really like it

Definitely a lot better than bioshock 2 but just below the original. The immersive environment distracted me from the linear gameplay throughout so thumbs up.

If you have played the last two Bioshocks this game is a trash! 
From the horrifing and atmospheric Rapture we are going on a flying city. Come on! Rapture for its time of period is a dream but this? A flying city in an epoch with steam machines? What a let down!
The Plasmids have became Vigors, in that epoch era DNA mutations? It's getting more silly... Vigors are worthless, I finished the game and I only use the crows! 
Guns... oh guns! Do you remember when you carried a whole arsenal and you combined them with the plasmids? Well... forget it! You carry only 2 weapons. 
The Hack has gone! The Selling Machines for me were worthless too.
In the half of the game I was saying to myself: keep playing, just finish the game, you paid it, just finish it! Every mission I had, I was rushing to finish it because I didn't wanted to play this game anymore!
The end was shit... and the whole storyline!
Generally, this game is a big letdown! Don't buy it if you have play the two other games, you will pissed of!

A shockingly underwhelming bog standard FPS. Such a shame as the art direction and story looked interesting. Played 6 hours and just could no longer stand the boredom of shooting the same things in the same way over and over again in order to progress the story. 

If you are not a super fan of everything FPS then stay clear of this one.
this game is interesting

1/10 game play

J'ai joué au premier ainsi qu'au second opus de la série, et celui ci n'est pas à la hauteur!
Comme beaucoup d'autres je n'ai pas apprécié de passer mon temps à chercher des objets dans les divers conteneurs, poubelles, bureaux, armoires etc. Les combats sont bourrins et l'espace de combat (pour ne pas dire l'arène) est toujours vaste et introduit par une musique "entrainante" (qui s'achève d'ailleurs lors de l'élimination du dernier ennemi!)... et puis voilà on retourne à errer dans les couloirs, on fait les poubelles et ça recommence plus loin!!. Zéro surprise mais accompagné d'Elisabeth qui semble avoir été placée à nos côtés pour nous commenter une histoire dont on se fout complètement (et à laquelle on ne pige plus rien au bout d'un moment), pour nous filer des munitions et autres médics à gogo et pour son décolleter qui mettront en émoi l'adolescent prépubaire. Quant aux tonics je cherche encore l'utilité de certains, on les oublie souvent et les cartes d'améliorations d'équipements glanées au fil du jeu ne servent littéralement à rien, visuellement aucuns changements notables.
Toutefois, c'est indéniable, c'est un beau jeu avec une durée de vie fort correcte.
Allez je vous laisse et je réinstalle le premier et revend celui-là!!

BioShock Infinite ist mein absoulter lieblings Shooter und das wegen der ...

Story:
Die Story ist sehr atmospärisch, voller Emotionen und am anfang evtl. etwas verwirrend. Es stellen sich viele viele Fragen auf, die man bis zum schluss beantwortet bekommt. Einige Frage bleiben allerdings dennoch unbeantwortet. Diese Fragen lösen bei mir eine starke neugier aus, worauf man das Spiel am liebsten am Stück durchspielen will. In keinem anderem Shooter findet man so eine packende Story. Die Stadt Columbia, in der das alles geschieht, ist sehr faszinierend und wunderschön designed. Man möchte am liebsten die ganze Zeit dort bleiben. Ich war am ende sehr traurig, dass es schon zueende war :( Irgendwie vermisse ich es, ein Big Dady zu sein ;(

Am besten sollte man das Spiel erst Spielen, sobald man die ersten beiden Teile gespielt hat. Es hat zwar keine wirkliche Story, die an Bioshock 2 anknüpft, doch es gab einige Ort an dennen ich mich sehr sentimental zurückerinnert gefühlt habe. (Spoiler)
[spoiler] Mann ist am ende in Rapture, das vor Bioshock 1 spielt und es ist einfach nur wunderschön geswesen.... Kann sich bestimmt jeder vorstellen, der Bioshock 1&2 gespielt hat. [/spoiler]


Leveldesign:
Das Spiel bietet einem eine menge Freiheiten beim vorgehen, obwohl die die Gebiete doch etwas schlauchig wirklen. Ob man jetzt von der SkyLine einen Angriff von oben starten möchte, die Umgebung so verändert das Gegner sterben oder versucht alles zu kombinieren. 
Wer versucht "Durchzurushen" wird schnell merken, dass es kein Sinn macht, da die Gegner schon auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Mittel jede menge Schaden austeilen können. Da ist man froh wenn mein eine so gut gestaltete Patnerin hat, die einen mit Munition versorgt, wenn es mal knapp mit allem wird. Etwas Geld organisiert, oder einem mit MediPacks bewirft sollte man kurz davor sein ins Gras zu beisen. Die Patnerin wird nie nervig und ich bin echt froh das ich die charmante und schlaue Elizabeth an meiner Seite habe. 
Wenn man die Welt gut genug durchsucht findet man sehr viele Bonusräume die einem mit einem haufen Geld, Ausrüstung und einigen Dingen mehr beschenken. Für diese Räume muss man manchmal allerdings manchmal in voherige Levelabschnitte zurück.

Grafik:
Die Grafik des Spiels, ist wunderbar. Es gibt sehr viele gute Effekte wie Explosionen und co. Auch die guten Details lassen das Spiel sehr gut aussehen. Allerdings fällt manchmal auf, das die Texturen, selbst auf Ultra, nicht sehr Hoch aufgelöst sind.
Es ist es ein Spiel für die Augen.

Musik/Vertonung:
Der deutsche Sprecher, der den Hauptcharakter gesprochen hat, hat eine einfach perfekte Stimme. Die klingt irgendwie fast wie aus einem Märchen. Auch die Sprecherin von Elizabeth hat einen super Job gemacht. Generell sind sehr viele gute Sprecher dabei. Die Musik ist sehr stimming und abwechlungsreich und fügt sich sehr gut in das Spiel ein.


Fazit: Für Personen die einen storybasierten Shooter haben wollen, ist dieses Spiel genau das richtige. 
Sofort zugreifen! Auch die Leute die nicht so überzeugt sind, sollten es probieren. Es ist sein Geld in allen belangen wert.

PS: Ich hoffe ich habe nicht vergessen ;)

Замечательная игра, но есть свои минусы.
 Плюсы:

Запутанный сюжет (Как и во всех играх Левина)

 Минусы:
Хоть графика и красивая, все равно видна не округлость предметов.
Есть такие моменты которые без смертей, пройти нельзя (Хотя это уже придирки)
 Вобщем, игра обязательна к покупке! (Ну или на крайний случай, можно скачать с ресурсов для нечестных людей (Если вы понимаете о чем я) :D). Моя оценка 9.8/10

Что я могу сказать об этой игре?Это что-то невообразимое!Я начал свое путешествие по вселенной Bioshock с первой части,и вот,наконец я купил их все.Каждая серия приносит в себе что-то новенькое.первая часть была довольна хардкорна но при этом был увлекательный сюжет и хороший геймплей.(Особенно битвы с папочками)Во второй мы сами становимся папочкой)Это один огромнейший плюс"_"
А насчет третьей части,как только я её запутил,я заорал на весь дом-"Графоооооон!!!"Даже на моем умственно отсталом компе картинка великолепна!Оптимизация на высшем уровне!И самое главное-это тот же биошок который три года назад заставил меня визжать от радости!)Отсутствие русской озвучки конечно минус,но для Биошока это простительно!)
P.S.В главную героиню невозможно не влюбиться,она великолепна)

Геймплей - [strike]г..вно[/strike] на любителя

Если в первый биошок было интересно проходить использую тоники и плазмиды, а также модернизируя оружие, то в этом поделии смысла в апгрейдах нет никакого - стволы меняешь как перчатки и все они одинаковые по сути. А плазмиды вообще прикрутили по всей видимости только для того чтобы заманить фанатов первого биошока; тут они как корове седло.

Raised the bar as much as the original Half-Life did.

First let me say (and I know many will disagree) that you do not have to play Bioshock 1 or 2 before playing Bioshock Infinite. However, you MUST play Bioshock 1 (and preferably Bioshock 2 as well) before playing Burial At Sea 1 & 2 (see the last paragraph for more info about this).

Now, as for Infinite: what a game. The game looks beautiful. When you see the city of Columbia for the first time, it is breathtaking. But the greatest strength of Infinite is its story. I'm a writer (fiction and nonfiction) and I loved the dialogue throughout the game. The voice acting is superb and the recordings (voxophones) that provide background are unique as well. There's a flawed protagonist (but one that's sympathetic at times) and a mission that becomes clearer (and more confusing) as you progress. Not to mention the AI for the other main character that follows you throughout most of the game is excellent. But the increasing depth of character as the game progresses is probably the greatest part of this game.

The mechanics of the game are great as well. Fighting with guns and vigors (special abilities) simultaneously is satisfying and fun. Flying along rails through the air using skyhooks never gets old. Enemy AI is nothing special but sheer numbers at the end provide a decent challenge. Also, once you beat the game, it unlocks 1999 mode for a real challenge. And don't even think you won't want to play through again. You will just to try and wrap your head around everything that happens.

The only criticism I have is that there's a tedious portion of the game between the middle and the end. It's a checklist of things you have to do and the respawning of enemies means fighting in locations more than once. By this point in the game, I was so interested in the story that I wanted it to progress faster.

Here's the bottom line: If you don't really care about storylines in games, then you probably won't appreciate this game as much as others. If you love a good story, then you will love this game. The gameplay mechanics are great though. So if you catch it on sale then you should probably get it even if you don't care about the story.

A last word about the Bioshock series. I actually played Infinite before Bioshock 1 or 2. This was a good choice because I'm not really a fan of scary games so I might not have played Bioshock without the need to see the whole story after playing Infinite. But it was also a bad choice because I didn't recognize a lot of stuff at the end of Infinite. Yet, this is easily fixed if you play through Infinite multiple times. But you really MUST play Bioshock 1 (at the very least) before playing Burial At Sea. The 2nd episode of Burial At Sea is fantastic but it will not make any sense whatsoever without the background of Bioshock (and the "recap" they provide in Burial At Sea is not an acceptable substitute). Seriously, if you're scared then make a friend play it and you just watch through your fingers. It's worth it.
